name: SolarSystem (AreejsGames)
description:
This is my solar system project.  I adjusted the main and minimap cameras for a wider look at the whole solar system, the range of the light from the sun, and the speed for each planet and I added the following planets in addition to the sun, earth and moon:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune

Credits, 

Credited by: Areej
